location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: A ‘List of Persions [persons] in the Office of the Resident in the Persian Gulf, drawing Rupees (50) fifty and upwards – their monthly pay and the nature of their qualifications’

mods.abstract: The list is a table showing the names, age, duration of service, present position and pay of those individuals employed by the Residency in Bushire, including the Agents at Bahrain, Sharga [Sharjah], Shiraz, and Lingah [Bandar-e Lengeh]. The table also includes a column containing the Resident’s comments on the conduct of each of the Residency employees. The list is signed by Felix Jones, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf.
